Date: Monday, 9/1/1976
Subject: Progress of Rufino Linares
Dear Sir,
Rufino Linares has an AVG of .319 at AA Knoxville Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Dan Boitano

Dan Boitano is doing pretty good at A Appleton Foxes!
He has an ERA of 2.65, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
